abstract: Four years after purchasing Esperion Therapeutics, a company focused on the discovery and development of compounds for cardiovascular and metabolic disease, Pfizer is selling the Ann Arbor, Mich.-based firm to an entity funded by a group of investors.
lead_paragraph: Four years after purchasing Esperion Therapeutics, a company focused on the discovery and development of compounds for cardiovascular and metabolic disease, Pfizer is selling the Ann Arbor, Mich.-based firm to an entity funded by a group of investors.

headline.main: Esperion Raises $22.8 Million After Pfizer Spin-Out
